titlestmt.titleproper: McLennan County Office of Price Administration records, Inclusive: 1941-1946, Bulk: 1945

profiledesc.creation: Finding Aid was generated by The Texas Collection staff, using the STAR Knowledge Center for Archives (SKCA) task that automatically creates EAD files from the Archive's SKCA catalog records.

did.head: Records Summary

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: McLennan County Office of Price Administration

did.unittitle: McLennan County Office of Price Administration records
did.abstract: The McLennan County Office of Price Administration records include various records from Waco area businesses, relating to operations during World War II in Waco, Texas.

bioghist.head: Biography/Profile
bioghist.p: The McLennan County Office of Price Administration was a local office of the national Office of Price Administration. This was a federal government office which attempted to keep prices stable and set maximum price amounts vendors could charge for essential consumer goods during World War II.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The McLennan County Office of Price Administration includes records on various local businesses serving "malt beverages" and several documents from local resident John Allen, including a war ration book and certificate of transfer for a vehicle.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The McLennan County Office of Price Administration was arranged by business prior to this finding aid. It is unknown if this was the original order of the collection when it came to The Texas Collection.
Currently, the collection is arranged in two series: I. Businesses and II. John Allen.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: All requests for copying of materials must be submitted to The Texas Collection in writing. Please use the Request Form for Copying Materials sheet. Unpublished materials authored or otherwise produced by the creator (s) of this collection are in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

userestrict.head: Use/Re-use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: McLennan County Office of Price Administration records, Accession #4052, Box #, Folder #, The Texas Collection, Baylor University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Described by Paul T. Fisher. Released on 2019-10-22.

bioghist.head: Biography/Profile
bioghist.p: This series contains materials on the McLennan County Office of Price Administration's efforts to regulate "malted beverages" at specific businesses in Waco.

did.unittitle: Slavonic Benevolent Order of the State of Texas

bioghist.head: Biography/Profile
bioghist.p: This series contains a war ration book and a certificate of transfer for a vehicle, both issues to a John Allen in Waco.
